Name: John Daly
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare lemon slice wheel for garnish.
Review: Essentially an alcoholic iced tea, this is bittersweet and refreshing - perfect for a hot afternoon.
History: Named after the American professional golfer noted for his victory in the 1991 PGA Championship and "colourful" personal life.
Nutrition: One serving of John Daly contains 197 calories
